programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tuleekin saalis? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat kokemuksistaan ja selviytymisestaan.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Hait ja delfiinit ovat aina elaneet samoissa vesissa, mutta tutkijat ovat vasta viime aikoina alkaneet ymmartaa naiden merten valtiaiden valisia suhteita.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Puukuiskaaja Pete Nelson ja tiimi suunnittelevat salaisia piilopaikkoja luontoyhteytta ja sisaisen lapsensa vapauttamista etsiville ihmisille.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perheen seitsemalle chinchillalle rakennetaan monimutkainen tunnelisto ja torneja. Jarjestelma ehkaisee jalkikasvua erottelemalla naaraat ja urokset eri puolille.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Kauhun valjaat. Kenttatyon johtaja Stacie DaBolt ryhtyy tutkimaan asiaa, kun elainsuojaan tuodaan koira, jolla on kivuliaat, syvalle hiertyneet valjaat ja erittain takkuinen turkki.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Syyhyn kourissa. Tutkija Marisa McHugh ja kenttatyon johtaja Stacie DaBolt kohtaavat kuuden riutuneen ja syyhyisen koiran omistajan.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa perheet lahtevat hirvimetsalle. Heimo ja Edna tekevat yhteistyota. Tyler seuraa valttelevaa uroshirvea.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Miten saalistajasta tuleekin saalis? Villielainten hyokkaysten kohteeksi joutuneet ihmiset kertovat kokemuksistaan ja selviytymisestaan.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Frankie -kissa pissaa ympariinsa Danielin ja Desireesin miljoonien dollarien unelmakodissa. Lisaksi Sugar -kissa pysyttelee piilossa uuden tulokkaan Dynan tielta.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Big Cat Tales
programme.desc: Chongo is unwilling to share buffalo with the rest of the pride and Fig continues to give vital lessons to the young cub and a cheetah and hyena battle.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Utelias ja aktiivinen kilpikonna lahtee paivakavelylleen. Kaksi partahaita paasee terveystarkastukseen. Henkilokunta valmistautuu lunnien soidinkauteen.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: RAndB-laulaja Keyshia Cole unelmoi kauniista suolavetisesta akvaariosta kotiinsa. Sosiaalisessa mediassa ihailijat johtavat hanet suoraan ATM:n pakeille!

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Taistelu hengesta. Kenttatyon johtaja DaBolt ja tutkija Barkley tutkivat ilmoituksia laittomasta koiratappelusta ja loytavat kolme kipeasti apua tarvitsevaa pitbullia.

programme.title: Phoenixin elainpoliisit
programme.desc: Elama ja kuolema. Sarjassa seurataan AHS:n tutkijoiden ja EAMT-hatalaakintajoukon tyota naiden suorittaessa elainjulmuuteen liittyvia tutkimuksia ja hatapelastuksia.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt antavat uudelleenrakentamisen oppitunnin Pohjois-Kaliforniassa auttaessaan perhetta, jonka omavaraistila tuhoutui tulipalossa.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Riistanvalvoja Benge palaa toihin toivuttuaan hengenvaarallisesta vammasta. Kalastajat jaavat kiinni rannikolla saaliinaan liian monta haita. Suojeltu kilpikonna saa uuden kodin.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Tomin taitoja ja kokemusta koetellaan, kun ilkikurinen Ruby-kissa taytyy saada tiheasta pensasaidasta takaisin omistajalleen.

programme.title: Kissapelastajat
programme.desc: Shaun tarttuu haasteeseen ja lahtee pelastamaan ensimmaista sokeaa kissaansa Snowta. Aiemminkin puuhun paatynyt Mow Mow on saatava jalleen maankamaralle.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Earl loytaa koiran, jolla on paha tulehdus ja useita kasvaimia, ja tiimi tekee kaikkensa pelastaakseen sen. Lakimies haluaa adoptoida aktiivisen koiran.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson hoitaa kissafobiasta karsivaa miesta. Coloradon osavaltiossa han pelastaa suosikkikissansa pelastuskeskukselta niin etta se saa jaada adoptiokotiinsa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Pariskunta tilaa Antoniolta ulkoleikkitilan, joka sopii heidan savannikissalleen ja neljalle hoitokissalleen. Rakennelmaan syntyy linkitettyja kavelyalueita ja kiipeilypintoja.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown ja heidan seitseman lastaan elavat julkisten palveluiden ulkopuolella ja selviavat yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt antavat uudelleenrakentamisen oppitunnin Pohjois-Kaliforniassa auttaessaan perhetta, jonka omavaraistila tuhoutui tulipalossa.

programme.title: I Was Prey
programme.desc: Sandy Prince is enjoying a swim in a river when she is attacked by a crocodile. Plus, a cougar leaps out at Phil Anderson in Washington State, can he fight it off?

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Tiimi kulkee vihjeen perassa syrjaiselle joelle Gronlannissa, mista pitaisi loytya rautua. He selvittavat myos tarua, jonka mukaan atlantinlohi pesii yksinaisella joella.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa Washingtoniin toimintaa ja rentoutumista yhdistavan valimuodon. Sisaan tullaan heiluvaa siltaa pitkin ja koysiradalla metsan halki. Jokaisen hurjapaan unelma!

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Jackson kohtaa Marleyn, joka aina lahtiessaan aiheuttaa veriloylyn seka kissakaksikon, joka tuhoaa kotinsa. Katso, miten Jacksonin ihmeelliset menetelmat oikein toimivat.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Take Back the Harbour
programme.desc: Osterit palaavat New Yorkin Governor-saarelle uraauurtava suojeluohjelman ansiosta. Niista on hyotya koko satama-alueen ymparistolle.

programme.title: Atlantan akvaario
programme.desc: Akvaarioilla on tarkea tehtava merielaman sailyttajina ja suojelupaikkoina kautta maailman. Georgian akvaario antaa esimerkkeja paivittaisista merkittavista tapahtumistaan.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Amy leikkaa kepin keihastaman koiran. Elainlaakari Baier hoitaa kiimaista Kino-koiraa, joka on steriloitu jo kahdesti.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Kalifornialaisravintola tilaa akvaarion uuteen toimipaikkaansa Santa Monicaan. Omistajat haluavat akvaarioon nostalgisen teeman ja muistoja sen 70-vuotisen taipaleen varrelta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Alkaa uustintana. Karhun pelastus. Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Animal Services Department -yksikon tyota Miamissa. Villielainagentit pyydetaan pelastamaan auton alle jaanytta mustakarhua. Tutkijat kuulustelevat laittoman sianteurastusoperaation omistajaa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kun valvontakamera nappaa kuvan kissaa hakkaavasta miehesta, tutkijoiden on saatava hanet kiinni. Laiminlyodyt koirat ovat kuoleman partaalla ja pollot pelastetaan purkualueelta.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Idaholaisen perheen riesana ovat romahtamisen partaalla oleva mokki ja sadan kanan katrasta uhkaava saalispeto. Raneyt saapuvat paikalle tekemaan tilasta asumiskelpoisen.

programme.title: Teksasin riistanvalvojat
programme.desc: Boone saa nimettoman vinkin laittomasta peuranmetsastajasta. McGee kuulustelee miesta, jolla on hallussaan myrkyllisia kuparipaakaarmeita.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa Washingtoniin toimintaa ja rentoutumista yhdistavan valimuodon. Sisaan tullaan heiluvaa siltaa pitkin ja koysiradalla metsan halki. Jokaisen hurjapaan unelma!

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Villalobos saa kutsun Dog Bowl -tapahtumaan, mika tarjoaa mahtavia adoptiomahdollisuuksia pelastetuille koirille. Pariskunta etsii ensimmaista adoptiokoiraansa.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Irwinin perhe on vuoden kestaneiden metsapalopelastustoimien ja surrealistisen maailmanlaajuisen pandemiasulun jalkeen valmiita uuteen kauteen ja avaavat Australian elaintarhansa uudelleen ja palaavat rakkaan tyonsa pariin hoitamaan elaimia.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Bronxin elaintarha
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia. (The Zoo, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa selvitaan vain yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat

programme.title: I Was Prey: Shark Week
programme.desc: Vaara vaanii Tyynenmeren pinnan alla. Iso valkohai tekee yllatyshyokkayksen uimassa olevan naisen kimppuun. Tiikerihai ahdistelee keihaskalastajia.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Onkologi Jenny Helm hoitaa rakastettua perhekissa Mishaa, jonka rinnasta on loytynyt kyhmy. Irtokoiranpentu Ellie saapuu uuden tyyppiseen leikkaukseen.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Pete rakentaa ensimmaisen ulkomaankohteensa Norjaan. Yhdessa paikallisen rakennusmies Froden kanssa nousee puumaja kahdeksan metrin korkeuteen, upeilla jarvinakymilla.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Suunnittelija Antonio Ballatore rakastaa elaimia. Hanen intohimonaan on yhdessa tiiminsa kanssa kunnostaa ransistyneita ja ahtaita koteja seka niiden pihoja uuteen, elain- ja ihmisystavallisempaan kuosiin.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Alkaa uustintana. Karhun pelastus. Dokumentaarinen sarja seuraa Animal Services Department -yksikon tyota Miamissa. Villielainagentit pyydetaan pelastamaan auton alle jaanytta mustakarhua. Tutkijat kuulustelevat laittoman sianteurastusoperaation omistajaa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Kun valvontakamera nappaa kuvan kissaa hakkaavasta miehesta, tutkijoiden on saatava hanet kiinni. Laiminlyodyt koirat ovat kuoleman partaalla ja pollot pelastetaan purkualueelta.

programme.title: Bronxin elaintarha
programme.desc: Kausi 2, osa 5. New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia. (The Zoo, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In New Zealand, the White Island volcano erupts with deadly consequences. A major storm pounds the city of Perth, triggering flash flooding, hail and a near-fatal road accident when a tree falls down.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Seventy-one million years ago lived a teenage Albertosaurus - a faster, nimbler relative of T. rex. She had to earn her place in a deadly, ferocious pack or risk starvation. Today, palaeontologists in western Canada are unearthing her remains, allowing us to imagine her story. Based on real-world evidence, stunning VFX recreate her encounters, from hunting pterosaurs to fighting the dominant matriarch and battling for survival in the brutal late Cretaceous world.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As Alaskans enter a new dawn in the Arctic winter, they must adapt to the changing landscape if they are to survive. As the region emerges from the darkness of the polar night, a renewed sense of energy and purpose fills the air.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: The presenter ventures deep into the Scottish Highlands to meet Iona and her young family on the near-10,000-acre wilderness estate that she grew up on. Whilst in their company, Ben drives cattle on horseback, digs out a dam to ensure the familys hydro-electricity supply and gets to grips with the annual deer cull, and hears how Ionas past prepared her for this extraordinary life in the wilderness.

programme.title: Programme to be Confirmed
programme.desc: Programme to be confirmed.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben revisits Alex, living in the mountains of central Portugal, discovering Alex has followed his dream of creating a retreat and made significant progress with the infrastructure on his land.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In New Zealand, the White Island volcano erupts with deadly consequences. A major storm pounds the city of Perth, triggering flash flooding, hail and a near-fatal road accident when a tree falls down.

programme.title: Deadly Mission Shark
programme.desc: Steve Backshall has chosen his UK team of six to travel with him to Bimini in the Bahamas, where they learn how to scuba dive and become the next generation of shark saviours.

programme.title: The Worlds Most Scenic Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Celebrating the wonders of Queensland, we travel over 1,000 miles from Brisbane to Cairns onboard one of the most advanced trains in the world.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: In a secluded valley on the island of Ibiza, Ben lives in a commune with an ex-navy officer who shunned a life of wealth and excess on the high seas for a back-to-basics existence.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: In the depths of winter, the off-grid Alaskans work tirelessly to combat the deep cold.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the production of baked beans, Cherry Healey follows a discarded can through a recycling centre, and Ruth Goodman explains the origins of tinned food

programme.title: Planet Earth III
programme.desc: Attenborough introduces conservation heroes fighting to save the worlds wildlife, from exploring remote jungles to going undercover to catch criminals in the illegal ivory trade.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Wildfires in Oregon, flash floods in Arizona, a family survive the most powerful typhoon to hit the Philippines and a story of survival in sub-zero temperatures for seven days in the Canadian Rockies.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Scientists believe that challenging the body can benefit the brain. Dr Michael Mosley learns how meditation can help fight dementia and how people can sharpen their minds by being more like children.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joannas emotional exploration begins at the rivers source, Germanys Black Forest mountains, ends at the Romanian/Ukrainian border, and marks two key anniversaries. The first is D-Day - the beginning of the end of World War Two and a brief era of freedom. 1/4

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: As the cold season wanes in the Arctic, winter does not go quietly into the night.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben ventures deep into the freezing tundra of Outer Mongolia to meet a couple who left their comfortable life in America to become missionaries in this remote corner of the world.

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asia has the longest coastline of any continent and the earths richest coral reefs. This episode explores Asias waters, as spectacular as they are diverse, and never-seen-before animal behaviour.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace explores the largest bicycle factory in Britain which produces 150 folding bike every 24 hours and joins a multi-stage manual production line to make his own bicycle. Meanwhile Cherry Healey gets some tips from Cycling Team GB to help us all improve our pedal power, including how lowering your body position can make a 10 per cent improvement to speed and efficiency. And historian Ruth Goodman reveals that folding bikes date back to the 1870s, and how 70,000 folding `parabikes" were manufactured during the Second World War, some of which played a role in the D-Day landings

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: The Hailstones produce an original work of Inupiaq art, and Cole Sturgis ventures into the wilds of the Southeast on a life-or-death hunt.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
programme.desc: Ben meets the Powell family who are living an off-grid existence in a hidden valley in the Black Mountains in Wales. While there he helps plant the biggest new woodland in Wales for a generation.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna heads towards the Danube Delta, one of the last great wilderness areas remaining in Europe, full of birdlife including the majestic Pelican. At the mouth of the river, on Romanias Black Sea coast, Joanna bids farewell to the Danube and reflects on her amazing journey.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: Firefighters battle through apocalyptic scenes on Australias Kangaroo Island as it is besieged by deadly bushfires. In Kansas, two hard-core tornado chasers allow a tourist to ride along with them.

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather
programme.desc: In New South Wales, Australia, the worst bushfires in recent history attack multiple towns, overwhelming firefighters and trapping tourists at a lake front caravan park. A 6.4 magnitude earthquake in the Philippines catches everyone off-guard. In England, its a fight for survival as a group of cavers attempt to rescue their colleague from the flooded section of an active cave. And in Kansas, two tornado chasers intercept a terrifying twister.

programme.desc: A tornado touchdown terrorises a school in Texas. The violent volcanic eruption in Tonga and a tsunami leaves residents trapped with nowhere to go and pilots battle extreme cross winds.

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers
programme.desc: Osteoporosis is a disease in which bones become brittle and easily broken. It is more common in women, and usually worsens with age. Michael Mosley sees how to keep bodies, bones and muscles healthy.

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: In Slovakia, Joanna traces Danube tributaries up to the top of the snow-capped Tatras. In Budapest she explores the river by boat and rides a unique childrens railway, as well as discovering the citys Jewish heritage.

programme.desc: The Alaskans are faced with adversity as they confront the unknown in the dead of winter.

programme.title: Asia

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Ranskalaiset leivonnaiset. Kausi 4, 9/10. Nelja amatoorileipuria on jaljella, mutta finaaliin mahtuu vain kolme. Rautaiset finalistit karsitaan talla kertaa aina yhta haastavien ranskalaisten leivonnaisten parissa. Choux-leivonnainen saa toimia alkulammittelyna teknisessa haasteessa odottavalle charlotte-kakulle. Tosileipurit erotellaan kuitenkin puuhastelijoista viimeisessa haasteessa, jossa nahdaan ranskalaisen konditoriamaailman piece de resistance, herkuttelun surmanhuippu, oopperakakku. Brittilaisessa leivontaohjelmassa innokkaat amatoorileipojat kisailevat toisiaan vastaan erilaisissa leivontahaasteissa.

programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. Flattered, our friends invite Bolly to choose his challenge to become an Adventurer too. Bolly will have to be the first Mushable to set foot somewhere. Mushton being crowded, Mush-Mush suggests they find an island, somewhere on the giant lake

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! Truff insists: they just need to relax and feel the groove. But when Truff tells his new band they will perform at the Food Snail, Lilit isnt relaxed at all!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summers Picnic. Only Puff isnt comfortable in that role. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to help and make sure all the Mushables will follow Puffs lead. Gradually, Puff gains confidence and ends up bossing everyone around. Now, all the Mushables are about to flee the Picnic!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realizes its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. Whilst he looks through the rangers books of fairytales the Lemmings try to recover the frog.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: By pure chance, Grizzy discovers the pleasures of video games on the rangers console. The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his Kart racing game. They try everything, including temptation, to get him away from the console but theres nothing doing, Grizzy is addicted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence leaves a lot to be desired.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, the she-bear Grizzys in love thinks shes a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When a meteorite falls not far from the log cabin, strange berries start to grow. One of their properties is that they make anyone who eats them grow to disproportionate sizes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Under the wood floor of the log cabin, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the entrance to an underground gallery with an old treasure card that indicates the location of a treasure. Upon closer look, the representation of this treasure greatly resembles a giant jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When he brandishes a native american scepter that the Lemmings brought home with other antique objects, Grizzy sees the Lemmings bow low before him and behave like servants. One of them has escaped the spell, but he will have to confront both Grizzy and his fellow creatures in order to recover the scepter and reverse the spell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy tries to impress the she-bear that hes in love with by making a sculpture of her from a piece of wood. But as soon as the artists back is turned, the Lemmings gnaw at the work of art in order to transform it into a toboggan slide. Grizzy must succeed in getting rid of the Lemmings without his model realizing whats going on. An Art in itself!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket makes Mr Bean drive her to the hospital to get her ingrown toenail seen to and asks him to wait. Mr Bean gets bored, and on a wander around the hospital he finds a spare doctors outfit with stethoscope great Teddy - Ill give you a check-up! But a nurse spots him, and thinking hes a new doctor Mr Bean is asked to visit patients. How long can he keep it up before hes found out?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is amazed by the way Mushpot uses his staff of wisdom and how awesome it makes him look. Mush-Mush wants to be as cool as Mushpot and asks him to lend him his staff of wisdom. But the staff comes with a lot of responsibilities...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush and Chep lose Lilits flying disc down a snake tunnel, he is confident he can get it back. All animals love Chep and no-one knows more about snakes than he does. But this snake is not to be messed with! When they finally sneak into the snake tunnel, they learn why the snake has been acting so strangely...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: All the Mushables have fun zooming down a long mudslide except Chep, who just cant get up the courage to do it. But when Fung and Miff tease him for being scared, he promises that he will do something that no Mushable has ever done before... ride a grasshopper! Chep is in for the ride of his life!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Lilit creates a "friends tree" mapping out who everyone is best friends with in Mushton, she realizes Muddler has no friends at all. Unable to accept this, Lilit slips away to try and befriend him. But Muddlers perception of friendship is somewhat unique, meaning Lilit now needs the help of her two best friends, Mush-Mush and Chep, to escape from Muddlers clutches.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A magic horn lands on the muzzle of a moose, endowing it with grace and the ability to fly. When Grizzy sees this strange creature, he dreams of taming it as a gift for she-bear while the Lemmings imagine themselves playing rodeo.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring which is equipped with a tracker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread, just in case the Lemmings should decide to carry it off.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a customized hang-glider using a supermarket shopping cart for the nacelle and a ventilator as an engine. Their aerobatics fascinate the she-bear that Grizzy is in love with, which gives him the idea of replacing the shopping cart with a double-seat and inviting his beloved for a sky promenade. But confiscating a wing in mid-flight is not within the reach of just any old bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings scribble all over the book Snow White on the living room sofa. Grizzy throws them off with scant ceremony and they crash to the floor with their book.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings favorite chocolate spread brand is organizing a big competition where the prize is a giant jar of spread. To win, one must make ten baskets in a row in a hoop set up on a supermarket parking lot for the occasion. Ready to play?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Freed from the ice which had preserved him for millions of years, a saber-toothed bear bursts into the cabin, starving to death. Grizzy fails to protect his reserves while the Lemmings fail at taming him for the rodeo - even though they all team up. But when they realize that a prehistoric necklace will enable them to control the creature, its each man for himself again!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a top-secret Canadian Army prototype that allows you to pass through solid surfaces for a window of several seconds. How can Grizzy prevent the "infiltrating" Lemmings from stealing his jar of chocolate spread?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have found an Amerindian eagle amulet that endows he who wears it with the powers of a bird of prey. Grizzy would like to impress his beloved she-bear by soaring majestically through the sky. But to confiscate the magic totem from the Lemmings, who are now as sharp as eagles, Grizzy will have to use the cunning... of a puma.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with the rangers electric guitar and the cabin walls tremble with their experimental rock. Just as Grizzy is about to destroy the instrument, he realizes it can make harmonious sounds too. Will this be enough to seduce the she-bear hes in love with?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy decides to give she-bear the flowers that decorate the window ledges of the rangers cabin. Can he bring them to her without the Lemmings ruining them?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: This is not Grizzys day: after making a fool of himself in front of the she-bear he is ousted from the cabin by the Lemmings. But his luck is about to change.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realizes its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. Whilst he looks through the rangers books of fairytales the Lemmings try to recover the frog.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

The Lemmings want to try their hand at the joystick but Grizzy refuses to interrupt his Kart racing game. They try everything, including temptation, to get him away from the console but theres nothing doing, Grizzy is addicted.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Om het mysterie op te lossen van de enge Crystal Crawler - een vleermuisachtig monster - moet de gang de Crystal Canopy in - een doolhof van complexe kristalformaties. Om het nog erger te maken, kunnen ze niet praten in de Canopy, omdat zelfs het kleinste beetje geluid ervoor kan zorgen dat alle kristallen om hen heen zullen vallen.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Ondanks dat Velma een hekel heeft aan water, gaat de gang aan boord van een cruiseschip van Freds neef. Maar een waterfobie is hun minste zorg wanneer een angstaanjagend zeemonster het schip aanvalt.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. Its up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gothams Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Mouse Sisters hire The Looney Builders to build a cheese cafe featuring a mural by Sylvester who is having a bad day.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders build Taz a wrecking ball vehicle, he struggles to learn how to operate it.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean receives a delivery of a bunch of flowers for Mrs Wicket, but accidentally runs them over in the his car. He cant afford to replace them, so he decides to recreate the bunch by taking flowers one by one from anywhere he can - a vase in a cafe, a wedding bouquet, even from between the teeth of a tango dancer! But will he assemble the bunch and be back in time for Mrs Wicket?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Chaotic cartoon capers following the further adventures of the popular halfwit immortalised in the live-action TV series and Hollywood films. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput outsmarts the Docs by luring them onto a street basketball court and pitting them against the toughest ballerz in town. When the jocks look like utterly destroying poor old Specs and Skinny, Lamputs conscience kicks in. Our orange buddy decides to help the Docs out with some of that special brand of court magic. Fate is fickle, though - when it comes out that the Docs are using a performance-enhancing orange blob, the jocks call foul. Specs and Skinny are reminded yet again what it feels like to be dunked on.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny "crashes" Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has got it into his head to offer a butterfly to the she bear hes in love with. But the Lemmings fight with him over the rare specimens hes spotted.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have discovered an addictive new game based on the astonishing bouncing properties of the rangers new running shoes. Grizzy, who is trying to relax, confiscates the shoes and soon realizes they are far more comfortable than his thongs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy babysits for the she-bear he has a crush on. Theres no question of Grizzy tripping up for he has no intention of taking any risks! But he hadnt reckone

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its Spikes birthday and he has been counting the days down. Every year, Rick goes all out to make it special, but not this one. He has forgotten! Seeing how sad Spike is, Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember. Unfortunately, their every effort backfires -- but dont worry, it ends happily.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A mockingbird has taken roost in a tree outside Gingers window, where it sings the sweetest songs whenever shes around. When she leaves for work, however, the mockingbird earns its name by mocking Tom and Jerry relentlessly. When her nest full of eggs hatches and the insults really take flight, Tom, Jerry and even Spike, decide its time for these birds to fly the coop!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When the Witch Sisters are brewing up their latest concoction, they discover that their stash of walnuts has disappeared. Needless to say, Jerry is enjoying the "nuts" of his labor, while Tom is sent out to gather more nuts. When Tom steals the winters supply of nuts from a feisty flying squirrel, things go from bad to worse. Not only does the squirrel take Jerrys stash, but the irate rodent launches an attack on Tom inside the house.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tom finally drifts off to sleep, Jerry heads for the coveted wedge of cheese in the kitchen only to have a pesky fly get between him and his meal. Even though Jerry offers to share the cheese, the winged cheese bandit sets out to do his very best to make sure that Jerry will never enjoy that cheese including waking up Tom!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Not wanting to miss a marathon of their favorite TV show, Butch and Meathead give Tom a fake treasure map in exchange for a little TV time. While they try to get comfortable in Rick and Gingers house, Tom and Jerry must figure out a way to circumvent Spike when they realize his house is sitting directly atop their riches.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Feeling bad for giving Toms precious blanket to Badwill, Jerrys determined to get it back. Unfortunately, retrieving gifted items from Badwill is not easy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
